show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: The Natural Nurse
content:
Dr. Eugene Zampieron, ND, AHG, www.drznaturally.com, interviews Dr. <!--more--> Peter Bongiorno , a naturopathic doctor and licensed acupuncturist.
He is Vice-President of the New York Association of Naturopathic Physicians.
Before medical school, he worked as a pre-doctoral fellow at the National Institutes of Health and Yale University.
He has co-authored numerous medical journal articles in the field of neuro-endocrinology.
Dr Bongiorno has also authored the complementary medicine chapter on natural medicine for depression in the psychiatric textbook The Biology of Depression (Wiley,2004) and has recently authored “Naturopathic and Integrative Medicine for Depression” which was published in August of 2010.
He maintains a thriving private practice in Manhattan and Huntington, NY.
He can be reached via www.InnerSourceHealth.com or by calling 917.710.
6852.
His book is available by visiting www.InnerSourceHealth.com/depression
